name: Goblin Treasure Room
description: A cramped chamber piled with stolen goods. A makeshift throne sits against the far wall.

descriptions.first_visit: Torches flicker over heaps of stolen trinkets and sacks of coins. A crude throne fashioned from scavenged wood dominates the room.
descriptions.return_visit: The treasure lies scattered where you left it. The throne stands empty.
descriptions.cleared: Only dust and a few broken crates remain of the goblins' hoard.

secrets.description: A loose stone hides a small stash.
